Detailed Description

This class manage the user interaction and the game status.

Author:
Bernardino Frola

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum LumpUserInterface::mEnumAttackModes

Attack modes.

  • ATTACKMODE_CONTINUOS: the flock follow the target in every time
  • ATTACKMODE_SINGLESHOOT: charging the attack, flock make only a big, directly attack

Member Function Documentation

void LumpUserInterface::execCommand (  ) 

When the user types a string into the console, this function recognize and execute the associated command.

void LumpUserInterface::updateGameBehaviour ( float  elapsedTime  ) 

Update the HUD's components.

void LumpUserInterface::updateHUD ( float  elapsedTime  ) 

Like LumpUserInterface::updateGameBehaviour, but the components updated here must not be infuenced by the current game speed.

void LumpUserInterface::stopSlowMotion (  ) 

Return to normal game speed.

void LumpUserInterface::initializeHUD (  ) 

Setup the HUD's components.

void LumpUserInterface::switchAttackModeToContinuos (  ) 

Swithch the attack mode state to mEnumAttackMode::ATTACKMODE_CONTINUOS

void LumpUserInterface::switchAttackModeToSingleShot (  ) 

Swithch the attack mode state to mEnumAttackMode::ATTACKMODE_SINGLESHOT

void LumpUserInterface::enterPause (  ) 

Pause the game and show the console.

void LumpUserInterface::exitPause (  ) 

Resume the game and hide the console.

Show the help information into the console.

void LumpUserInterface::cmdLogger (  ) 

Show/hide logger.

void LumpUserInterface::cmdFps (  ) 

Show/hide stats.

Show the key mapping.

Member Data Documentation

float LumpUserInterface::gameSpeed [protected]

Speed of the game.

float LumpUserInterface::lastGameSpeed [protected]

Used for backsup the original game speed on slow motion.

float LumpUserInterface::speedAfterPause [protected]

Used for backsup the original game speed during the game pause.

mEnumControllerStates LumpUserInterface::mControllerState [protected]

Manage the controller state.

float LumpUserInterface::mMouseSpeedFactor [protected]

Used to achieve a dynamic mouse speed factor.

float LumpUserInterface::mOldMouseSpeedFactor [protected]

Increasing the zoom, the mouse speed decrease. This field backs up the mMouseSpeedFactor during the zoom.

float LumpUserInterface::mSlowMotionRemainingTime [protected]

Time between now and the slow motion end.

float LumpUserInterface::mSlowMotionGameSpeed [protected]

Game speed during slow motion.

Radian LumpUserInterface::mRotX [protected]

Mouse coordinates, in radiants.

string LumpUserInterface::mUserCommand [protected]

String typed by the user into the game console.

mEnumAttackModes LumpUserInterface::mAttackMode [protected]

Continuos or single shot attack.

float LumpUserInterface::mAttackChargeLevel [protected]

During the single shot attack this var carries out the attack charge level.

float LumpUserInterface::mZoomValue [protected]

The value of the zoom. By default is fixed to 0.5.

bool LumpUserInterface::mShowLogger [protected]

Flag use to show/hide the right logger panel.

bool LumpUserInterface::mShowFps [protected]

Flag use to show/hide the fps and stats panel.

bool LumpUserInterface::mUpdateCounter [protected]

Use to reduce the updates of the HUD.
